headline: Gen to Announce Fiscal 2026 First Quarter Results on August 7, 2025
summary: Gen Digital Inc. (NASDAQ: GEN) today announced that its fiscal 2026 first quarter financial results will be released Thursday, August 7, 2025, after market close. Following the press release, Gen management will host a conference call and webcast at 2 p.m. PT / 5 p.m. ET.
